page.title: \lambda\delta home page
page.head: cic:/matita/lambdadelta/static_2/ (syntactic components of λδ version 2)
page.body: This specification contains the syntactic components of λδ version 2 that every forthcoming system of the λδ family will share.
Here is a numerical account of the specification's contents and its timeline.
This table reports the specification's components and their planes.
